nodes.text: Staven Kremmos was a Human male who was widely recognized as one of the finest minds on Naboo. He was sent to Nubia with a team of engineers to design the J-type 327 Nubian royal starship for King Ars Veruna.
Staven Kremmos is mentioned in an online article for Secrets of Naboo, a 2001 roleplaying game sourcebook by Wizards of the Coast.
